experience.title: Frontend Lead (React)
notes: Writing clean, efficient code and optimizing performance for smooth user experiences.
Participating in sprint planning, debugging sessions, and deployment workflows using version control tools like Git.

experience.title: React Bootcamper
notes: Got selected as a bootcamper in Proshore’s frontend development stream after three rounds of interviews.
Worked on a real-world project — building a task management application using React and TypeScript.

experience.title: Web Developer
notes: Working on multiple web development projects as a Frontend Developer for a dental clinic and a consultancy.
Providing hosting solutions and UI/UX design services to meet client needs.

experience.title: Creative Designer
notes: Created promotional content for clients across various industries and designed engaging web interfaces tailored to their needs.
Planned and conducted weekly meetings with individual clients to understand their requirements and gather feedback.

experience.title: Web Developer & Creative Designer
notes: Designed and built dynamic and responsive websites for hotels like Hotel Thrive, Mithila Yatri Niwas, and more using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Developed visually appealing and user-centric designs to help clients attract and retain their customer base.

education.info: Gained practical experience in software development, information systems, and project management. Completed capstone projects using React, Node.js, and MySQL.
Built foundational knowledge in accounting, business studies, and economics while exploring early interests in computer applications.
Received awards for academic excellence and participated in extracurricular activities including IT clubs and inter-school competitions.
